name: Missing Colors
description:
MISSING COLORS

A game set in the studio of a young artist looking for a place in the art world. Switch between red and blue to finish paintings! Activate paint blocks to clear your way or form helpful structures to hop across! Solve puzzles and platform your way into helping each other color your worlds in a new way. Avoid danger or use it to your advantage. Struggle with your artistic identity and figure out if creating art is truly worth it.

CONTROLS

You'll learn by playing :)

THE TEAM

Annie Zhang: Producer, Sound, Concepting

Robert Newlin: Programming, Level Design

Michael Remorin: Programming, Art

*IN DEVELOPMENT*

Currently planned changes:

- More art polish

- Iterate on levels

Current known bugs:

- Tabbing out or click away from the game causes the buttons/doors to behave strangely. Fixes itself by clicking back on the game
